Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display time after every second on a label using the <font face="courier new">Label</font> control and the <font face="courier new">Timer</font> component. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
Label lblTime = new Label();
Timer tmrCounter = new Timer();

lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
tmrCounter.Interval = 1000;
tmrCounter.Start(true);

void tmrCounter_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
}

Label lblTime = new Label();
Timer tmrCounter = new Timer();

lblTime.Text = DateTime.Time.ToLongTimeString();
tmrCounter.Interval = 1000;
tmrCounter.Start();

void tmrCounter_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
}

Label lblTime = new Label();
Timer tmrCounter = new Timer();

lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
tmrCounter.Interval = 1000;
tmrCounter.Start=true;

void tmrCounter_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
}

Label lblTime = new Label();
Timer tmrCounter = new Timer();

lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
tmrCounter.Interval = 1000;
tmrCounter.Start();

void tmrCounter_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  lblTime.Text = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString();
}

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct. You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (D).
